texts.text: Fighting other Dino is the best way of gaining *Experience*. You can fight the Dino that are in the same place as yours.
Fiche du Dino dans l'admin
This shows the list of Dino that are in this place.
Use this action to move around in the world of Dinoland and discover new places. You can carry out *one movement per day and per Dino*.
Here, you can consult the ranking of one or several tournaments that are taking place!
The biggest tournament in Dinoland!
Buy and sell Dino!
Discover the fantastic special offers of Sparky the Witch!
Ideal for recovering health.
A tournament accessible to all Dino!
In the direction of Mount Dino.
He doesn't look very friendly!
One of the Four Great Tournaments: beware of the precipice!
Click to see the ranking of the Dino who are, at present, taking part in this tournament, and follow their progress.
A Sparky Witch potion enables your Dino to carry out a *new Combat* and *a movement* in the same day!
A Sparky Witch potion enables your Dino to carry out a *new Combat* and *a movement* in the same day!
A Sparky Witch potion enables your Dino to carry out a *new Combat* and *a movement* in the same day!
Meditation permits us to relax and to understand better all that is going on around us. It's advisable for all Dino.
One of the Four Great Tournaments, and possibly the most difficult to enter in.
One of the Four Great Tournaments, and possibly the most difficult to enter in.
The runes, engraved on the lower part of the Granite Door, are written in a language that your Dino can understand.
Careful with your wallet!
Try crossing the forest without getting lost.
The doors of a pretty Blackberry Drink shop open for you.
Climbing to reach the volcano (success depends on your level of climbing). This action counts as a normal movement.
One of the Four Great Tournaments, which takes place in a fierce jungle.
Fantastic bargains in the ICO!
You'd better not get seasick easily...
Digging enables you to find *Collection Items* buried in the ground. The higher the level of your skill at this, the more possibilities you'll have of finding a treasure.
Give a juggling demonstration to get the attention of the others and thus protect your other Dino!
Change the text at the end of the combat to provoke your opponent.
Investigate to find out what happened.
Speak to a... pony?!
Climbing to reach Burdesky (success depends on your Climbing level). This action counts as a normal movement.
Climbing to reach Burdesky from the steepest side of the mountain (success depends on your Climbing level). This action counts as a normal movement.
Drink water in the Fountain and cure the Chikabum Virus.
The Chaman on duty winks his eye at you.
*Attention*: this action will take you back to Dinoland!
Prepare your gold... and, just in case, get ready to run!
The travelling Merchant goes, each day, to different places to sell his strange goods.
The shop is open every day.
Well... I don't know if this is a good idea...
Go to the Jazz Island Fusion Centre
Visit the enchanting Altar of Sacrifice, dedicated to the Demons of Dinoland.
OFF
Votre Dino peut visiter le Temple de ce *Dieu*
Votre Dino peut visiter le Temple de ce *Dieu*
Votre Dino peut visiter le Temple de ce *Dieu*
ON
The Hermit opened this *Arena* so that you can train your Dinos
ON
Your Dino has no more life points, an *Angel Potion* can help him.
You can't use this item in the present circumstances. It won't have any effect.

Ahh Ahaahahaaaarrgg That wasn't so bad I'll be back! You are a nobody as far as I'm concerned You are tickling me ... May the force be with you Live with honor. Kill with stealth Your attacks have no effect whatsoever on me... I'll remember your face!

Come here if you dare! Come here, hit me... you'll be sorry I'm invincible! I'll flatten you! You're going to die suffering Get away from me! I'm a pacifist! ... Glup! Det luktar flingor har! You'll soon find out how strong I am! Attack the enemy!

How are things with you Sparky?|I can't hear you my dear| Will I become an Alchemist?|YES!| What colour is the white horse of Dinak the Valiant?|Grey, because it's filthy.| Are there any Kodamas in the forest?|There are very few left, but there are some.| Is David the Gnome still far away?|Yes, very far!|
::name:: has attracted attention to himself! All your Dino lose *::danger::* Danger and ::name:: gains ::tot:: Danger. What an amazing juggling show!
::name:: has been attacked just after the combat! He's lost ::lost::% of life (see the Sheet).
%A %d %B at %H:%M
A-Za-z0-9 éàèïäëùâêûîç_-
Do you confirm this action?
en_US
EN
icon_help.en.gif
button_back.en.gif
*::name::* has slipped and fallen! He returns dazed to the Saint-Moria port. Perhaps he should work harder on his Climbing skills?
*::name::* is incapable of climbing so high! He should learn to Climb.
*::name::* can't climb the volcano now because he's already moved today.
*::name::* has failed in his climb to Burdesky!
*::name::* has failed to climb to Burdesky! Perhaps he should look for an easier wall to climb...
After a good while under the tap, the Chikabum Virus disappears from ::name::. It's about time! The Fountain sings, for the third time, the most popular chorus from Pop Star Dino Idols.
creator
Welcome to Dinoparc! You can now buy your first Dino and start your adventure!
Congratulations! You've just bought a Dino!
You have bought *::count:: Sparky Witch potion(s)* for ::price:: gold coins.
You have bought a *bottle of Blackberry liquor* for ::price:: gold coins.
*::name::* has bravely won the combat against [::action::user;id=::id:: *::tname::*]. He has gained *::xp::%* of experience and has lost *::life::%* of life!
*::name::* has weakened before the power of [::action::user;id=::id:: *::tname::*]. He has gained *::xp::%* of experience and has lost *::life::%* of life!
*::tname::* has flattened [::action::user;id=::id:: *::name::*], who tried to attack him. Your Dino has gained *::xp::%* of experience and has lost *::life::%* of life!
*::tname::* has been cowardly attacked and beaten by [::action::user;id=::id:: *::name::*]. Your Dino has gained *::xp::%* of experience and has lost *::life::%* of life! What a disaster!
You have bought ::n:: item$$plural(::n::) *::name::* for ::price:: gold coins.
*Your account has been reactivated*.
You have obtained *::money:: coins* from the Dinoparc Bank. Congratulations!
You have obtained *::bills:: Market Bonds* from the Dinoparc Bank. Congratulations!
Your friend ::name:: has helped you win *::money:: coins*. Congratulations!
::name:: has successfully avoided an attack from ::opp::, wow! That was close!
::name:: has reached *level ::level::*. Your Dino has increased his level in the skill of *::comp::*.
After a brave and furious fight, ::name:: has died!
At the end of the combat you realize that *::dino::* has craftily stolen from you the item *::obj::*!
Bravo! You have won the Collection item: *::obj::*!
The creator of the clan *::clname::* has expelled you. You can join another clan on this page: [::action::clan *Clans*].
The creator of the clan has *expelled me*... what a humilliation!
I have decided *to abandon the clan*. Goodbye, until our destinies meet once again.
You have expelled the player [::action::user;id=::id:: *::name::*] from the clan.
The creator of the clan *::clname::* has accepted your application to join his clan. You now form part of the glorious clan of [::action::clan_show;id=::id:: *::clname::*]!
The creator of the clan *::clname::* has refused your application to join his clan. The *::price:: coins* have been given back to you.
You have abandoned the clan *::clname::*.
Your clan *::clname::* has been deleted as you have requested.
Your clan *::clname::* has been disbanded by an Administrator.
The clan [::action::clan_show;id=::id:: ::clname::] has chosen to give up the war against our clan. We have *won the war* against them! Congratulations to everybody!
I have decided to *abandon the war* against the Clan [::action::clan_show;id=::id:: ::clname::]. This may be a wise decision after all...
*In the name of all the members of the clan*, I have decided to declare War on our enemies of the clan [::action::clan_show;id=::id:: ::name::]. Courage, let's go and attack them!
The clan [::action::clan_show;id=::id:: ::name::] has just *declared War on us*! Let's be strong and defend ourselves! We'll flatten them and win the War!

[::action::user;id=::uid:: ::uname::] has got the last point in the War against the clan [::action::clan_show;id=::cid:: ::cname::] which means that our clan *has won the War!* Congratulations to the brave warriors!

[::action::user;id=::uid:: ::uname::] from the clan [::action::clan_show;id=::cid:: ::cname::] has just won the last battle. *Our clan has been beaten and we have lost the War*, we will need time to get our strength back.
*Congratulations to everyone for all the offerings to the Totem!* I have chosen to win *::bonus:: points* for the Clan. War is not always the best solution.
*I've decided to transfer the administration of the clan to* [::action::user;id=::id:: ::name::].
I've succeeded in *crushing* our enemies!
I've failed in *crushing* our enemies...
*The clan [::action::clan_show;id=::id:: ::name::] has accepted forming an Alliance with us!*
*The clan [::action::clan_show;id=::id:: ::name::] has refused to form an Alliance with us!* They will pay for their insolence!
*The clan [::action::clan_show;id=::id:: ::name::] has cancelled our Alliance!* This is an insult!
*WE HAVE BEEN BETRAYED by the clan [::action::clan_show;id=::id:: ::name::]* They have taken advantage of our Alliance and have infiltrated our headquarters. They have won a war without fighting!
Acting in accordance with your application, we have proceeded to free the Dino *::name::*.

::foreach el:: ::if charm:: Your *::name::* has avoided the loss of *::pv::%* of life. ::elseif poison:: You have been *poisoned* during this combat! ::elseif claws:: You have succeeded in *poisoning* your opponent! ::elseif virus_get:: Your enemy has infected you with the *Chikabum Virus*! ::elseif virus_put:: You have infected your enemy with the *Chikabum Virus*! ::end:: ::end::
Your Dino *::name::* has lost *::life::%* of life because he has been poisoned! You'd better find an antidote, as soon as possible!
You have sold *::name::* in the market for $$price(::price::).
You have bought a Dino in the market for $$price(::price::). Congratulatons!
*::name::* has been infected by the Chikabum Virus while he was in the swamp. From now on, he will infect the virus to all the enemies he fights against!
*::name::* has lost a life point because of the Chikabum Virus!
*::name::* has been beaten and captured by [::action::user;id=::id:: ::dname::]!
*::name::* has abandoned you and has reverted to his primitive state. You'll have to look after him better next time!
Your mastery of *martial arts* has enabled you to fend off numerous attacks.
Your opponent has the same level of mastery of *martial arts* as you.
Your opponent is better than you at *martial arts*, which has made you lose a *::d::%* of life.
Your *stamina* has enabled you to prevent the loss of a *::d::%* of life. *Note*: these injuries don't count in the total of Life lost shown above. These are simply injuries which haven't happened.
Your opponent has been *Knocked Out*!
Your *strength* has made your opponent lose *::d::%* of life.
Weakened by his wounds, *::name::* collapses at the end of the combat!
Your Dino quickly uses *first aid* and recovers ::d::% of life just after the combat.
The conditions of the combat have not permitted your Dino to use *first aid* (that means that, either you haven't lost any life points or your attempt at healing has failed)
Bravo! Thanks to you, your clan has just won *::p:: point(s)* and the enemy clan has lost ::p::.
Your opponent is very low on points, so you can't have points if you beat him.
Due to your ineptitude in combat, you have made your clan *lose ::p:: point(s)* and the enemy clan has won ::p::.
Your *::name::* has been activated and this allows you to avoid the loss of a *::pv::%* life!
Nothing out of the ordinary: the combat has taken place normally.
Your claws have *poisoned* your opponent!
Your opponent has *poisoned* you!!
Your opponent has infected you with the Chikabum virus!!
You have infected your opponent with the Chikabum Virus!
You have captured a very rare Dino!
You have advanced in the *Kabuki Quest*! Find the next Kabuki to fight! (if your Dino dies, the quest starts again from the beginning).
Well done, you have finished the *Kabuki Quest*! You obtain an Epic item wich gives you access to Kabukis from the dino shop (they will appear rarely!).
Le Clan adverse n'étant pas protégé par un Dieu, vous obtenez *1 point* supplémentaire.
Le Dieu de votre Clan vous prette sa force et vous fait obtenir *::n:: points* supplémentaires !
The Incandescent Spell enables your Dino to nullify the damage which would be caused by the next *Fire* attack that he suffers.
The Titan Spell enables your Dino to nullify the damage which would be caused by the next *Earth* attack that he suffers.
The Volvik Spell enables your Dino to nullify the damage which would be caused by the next *Water* attack that he suffers.
The 220W Spell enables your Dino to nullify the damage which would be caused by the next *Thunder* attack that he suffers.
The Wind Spell enables your Dino to nullify the damage which would be caused by the next *Air* attack that he suffers.
If you can make your opponent lose life, then he will be *poisoned*!
Find your enemies – wherever they are!
This Power gives you +2 in Earth and +2 in Air.
This Power gives you +2 in Fire and +2 in Lightening.
This Power gives you +5 in Water.
The Fountain gives you immunity against the Chikabum Virus! In any case, each attempt of infection by the virus, will always have the possibility of annulling this immunity.
Your Dino will resist the next infection by the Chikabum Virus that he suffers.
Your Dino has been *poisoned*. You must cure him with an antidote or he will lose *a percentage of life every day*.

Your Dino has caught the *Chikabum Virus*!! He loses 1% of life every day and he'll infect his opponents. He can only be cured on *Jazz island*, where you can get information for yourself. You can get to this place *from the Clearing in the Woods*.
This effect shows you your progression in the Kabuki Quest. You have already defeated *::n:: Kabukis*. If you die, you should start again the quest from the beginning.
Votre Dino est un humble Disciple du Dieu Ubountos.
Votre Dino est un docile Disciple du Dieu Apoltron.
Votre Dino est un vaillant Disciple du Dieu Actarux.
